title: Huge Walk-In Closet, Rooftop Terrace, Attached Garage!!
posting_body: See a 3D tour here: <URL>
Open Monday through Saturday from 9:00 am to 6:00 pm, and Sunday from 10:00 am to 5:00 pm.
Stop by today for an in-person tour of the Community!
Virtual tours are also available!
Pet friendly!
33 8th Street at Trinity Place is an architecturally magnificent apartment building with all the comfort, convenience, and style you need.
*On-site, underground assigned parking spaces available!
*Additional cost.
San Francisco's Mid-Market has yet to see anything like it!
A stunning high-rise community surrounds an all-new, beautifully designed one-acre park with a spectacular 92 ft. statue of Venus-- the tallest sculpture in The City.
Apartment Features (* Available in Select Units)
- Large floor plan
- Modern Kitchen with European Appliance Package
- High-end Caesar-stone Counter
- Large Bathroom with Walk-in Shower*
- Spacious Walk-in Closet*
- Courtyard and City Views
- High Ceilings*
Building Amenities
- Piazza Angelo, an Art-filled One Acre Outdoor Park, is Open
- 24-Hour Front Desk
- State of the Art Fitness Center with Wi-Fi Lounge
- Rooftop Terrace is an Open/ Resident Lounge Offering Breathtaking Views of The City
- Onsite Garage Parking
- Steps Away from Tech Shuttles, BART and MUNI
- Free Bike Storage with Repair Station
- Parcel Lockers For Resident Deliveries
Twitter, Dolby, Square & more are blocks away
BART & Muni Rail are steps away!
Grocery shop at The Market (0.2 miles)
Across the street from South Bay shuttles
Shop at Westfield Mall (0.7 miles)
Broadway shows at The Orpheum Theatre (across the street)
Your daily cup of joe at Saint Frank Coffee (across the street)

This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.
